name: KoogeekHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen light”
”Alexa, turn off Kitchen light”
”Alexa, set hallway light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Purpose: Control P2 by asking Alexa. (Currently only P2 works with Amazon Alexa)

Features:
Turn the plug on and off by asking Alexa.
Turn the night light on and off by asking Alexa.
Adjust the brightness of the night light by asking Alexa.

Detailed steps for the customer to get started:
1. Download and open the free Koogeek Home app from the Apple Store or Google Play.
2. Log in or register the Koogeek account.
3. Tap "+" in the upper-right corner to enter the interface for adding the device.
4. Select an unconfigured outlet.
5. Select a Wi-Fi account and input the correct password. Wait for the network configuration to finish.
6. Name the plug to help you identify it in Koogeek Home and to control it with Alexa.
7. Name the night light to help you identify it in Koogeek Home and to control it with Alexa.
8. Open the Alexa app, 1) tap menu, 2) choose “Skills”, 3) search “Koogeek Home” and 4) tap “Enable”.
9. Log in with the account and password of the Koogeek Home app.
10. The device has been discovered by Alexa and matched successfully.
11. Control the device by asking Alexa. For example, “Alexa, turn on kitchen light.”
